downloadTitle: Access Teams with Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013
downloadDescription: This paper describes new team management capabilities in Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 that are very helpful in selling scenarios, particularly where a team manages an opportunity.

downloadFile.name: Access Teams with Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013.pdf

detailsSection:
Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 introduces new team management capabilities that are especially useful in selling scenarios, where a team manages a particular opportunity. You can use new team management with other record types, such as cases, contracts, or campaigns, however, this whitepaper focuses on the sales scenario. The key capabilities include:
  • Access teams: Lightweight teams aimed at high volume sharing scenarios.
  • Automated creation and management of access teams: Simplifying the administration process for scenarios where individual teams are defined to manage a particular customer.
detailsSection_file_name: Access Teams with Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013.pdf
installInstructionSection:
1. To start the download, click Download, and then click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
